metadata.name: The Old Train
metadata.description:
Portrait of a driver of an old historic tram. When he saw the camera, he proudly paused. He was  dressed in the original costume of the time. These trams only run occasionally in town.
Location: Brussels, Belgium

Year: 2022

Artist: Sa√Ød CHAARA

Collection: Film Photography

Camera: Olympus Mju II

Film: Kodak Porta 400

Edition: 1/1

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by the holder of the NFT, as long as the creator is credited. Copyright remains with the creator.
